long: A short mithril spear chills the air around its point.
A light-weight steel dagger has been dropped here in its scabbard.
A steel ring lying here has been studded with small turquoise stones.
This strong oaken staff has a heavy, weighted end.
The jade axe lying here has been inset with small jade stones.
The gloves lying here look to be made of soft, supple leather.
The pair of leather boots leaning here looks quite sturdy.
This headband has been formed out of hard leather.
A comfortable-looking cotton cloak has been left here in a roll.
A fine, cyan-trimmed silk tunic has been left here.
This linen belt has been dyed a bright cyan.
The tunic here has been folded into a neat little square.
This steel chain skirt has been painted white.
A pair of boots with spiked toes rest against each other.
The onyx broach lying here is in the shape of a dancing drow.
A gilded collar clasp has been studded with fake gems.
A long, flowing silk cloak lies here.
A pair of soft leather gloves has been bleached and dyed bright cyan.
A club made of sturdy oak rolls slightly here.
The white cloak here appears to be made of bleached wool.
This silver bracelet has been studded with polished opal stones.
A cotton shirt has been left nicely folded.
A large cloak of forest-green material has been discarded here.
A leather whip lies here, in coils.
A long pointed stick rests here on the ground.
A wide-bladed steel sword lies upon the ground.
A hardwood torch would burn brightly if lit.
A delicate white silk dress has been discarded.
This pair of steel bracers has been dyed a bright cyan in color.
The satin dress that has been left lying here threatens to wrinkle.
A white cotton apron is spotted with stains.
A pair of leather boots has been left behind.
This intricately crafted golden necklace sparkles brightly.
The bright red marble lying on the ground here threatens to trip someone.
A pair of chainmail sleeves has been painted white.
A wickedly spiked helmet rests here.
The thick bracelet lying here appears to be pure silver.
A necklace of white pearls gleams slightly pink.
The folded tunic here is bright red in color.
This steel helmet with a {Rvisor{x has been dyed white.
A shield here is adorned with cruel spikes.
This tiny dagger would seem to be easily concealable.
The flail which lies here looks quite dangerous.
This brightly gleaming spear almost seems to glow from within.
The handle of the pike lying here has been spiked with metal.
The black hat lying here looks quite jaunty.
A pair of spiked gauntlets looks quite dangerous.
An ice pick with a wooden handle has been left here.
A peach-colored ribbon drifts gently across the ground.
The steel good luck charm resting here looks like a breaking wave.
The whip lying here has long, dangerous-looking spikes.
A plain tunic has been dropped here.
This long, slender sword looks to be a dueling weapon.
A child's tunic has been dropped here carelessly.
A steel bucket rusts slowly upon the ground.
Resting here is a stained, battered smock.
A pile of valuable brown satin has been left here.
A large steel trash bin stands here.

short: a plain pair of linen trousers
long: A pair of linen trousers appears to have been abandoned here.
The lantern floating here hums slightly.
A cloth doll dressed in bright cyan clothes has been left here.
This glass model of a pigeon looks very life-like.
A pair of steel bracers lies here, looking innocent.
A goose-feather duster floats through the air, dusting automatically.
This plain gray uniform is of the sort a servant would wear.
The ring upon the ground has spikes along a quarter of its circle.
A pair of bright blue satin slippers has been left here.
A slender wooden pole looks quite supple.
Someone has peeled a tattoo out of their skin and left it here.
The tangy scent of apple wood drifts from the staff lying here.
The hawthorn staff here looks more like a switch than anything else.
A staff of supple willow lies here harmlessly.
A stout staff of supple birch glows supportively.
The wand lying here looks to be of maple.
A sturdy wand of ebony wood glows faintly with power.
The grain of wood on the wand lying here indicates it is made of oak.
The long wand resting here smells like hickory.
